project.name: TempMail SaaS
project.description: A professional, sleek, dark-mode temporary email service with admin capabilities.

headings.usage: Use for all section titles, hero text, and modal headers. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for standard text, inputs, and data tables. Normal tracking.

mono.usage: Use exclusively for email addresses, access codes, and API keys.

login_background.usage: Full screen background for login page with overlay

security_hero.usage: Optional hero image for security features or admin login

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(99,102,241,0.5)] transition-all duration-300
buttons.icon: h-10 w-10 rounded-full p-0 flex items-center justify-center hover:bg-white/10

cards.base: bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 shadow-2xl rounded-2xl

inputs.base: bg-black/20 border-white/10 focus:border-primary/50 focus:ring-primary/20 h-12 text-base placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

login_page.background: Use 'login_background' with a heavy dark overlay (bg-black/60)
login_page.card: Glassmorphic card, centered, max-w-md w-full, p-8

dashboard.grid: Grid layout for email list and email detail view
dashboard.email_list: Scrollable list on left (or top on mobile)
dashboard.email_detail: Reading pane on right (or modal on mobile)
dashboard.actions: Floating action button or prominent header button for 'Generate New Email'

admin_panel.tables: Shadcn Table component, dense styling, row hover effects
admin_panel.stats: Top row of 3-4 summary cards (Total Emails, Active Users, Storage)

instructions_to_main_agent: Ensure all text on dark backgrounds has sufficient contrast (text-slate-200 or text-white).
Do NOT use gradients for text unless it's a very large hero heading.
Use 'date-fns' for date formatting if needed.
For the 'Copy' functionality, provide immediate visual feedback (icon change or toast).
The 'Generate Email' action should feel significant - maybe a small spinner or animation before showing the new address.
Admin tables must have pagination if data exceeds 10 rows.
Strictly follow the 'Manrope' (Headings) and 'Inter' (Body) font rules. Add them via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS import.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
